text: Himitsu Sentai Goranger is a Japanese television series. It is the 1st in Toei's Super Sentai series. Goranger, by Shotaro Ishinomori, was the first in the long-running Super Sentai metaseries of tokusatsu programming. The series aired on NET (now TV Asahi) from April 4, 1975 to March 26, 1977, 84 episodes. ==Characters== ===Gorengers=== Actor Name Rangers Naoya Makoto Tsuyoshi Kaijou Akarenger Hiroshi Miyauchi Akira Shinmei Aorenger Bate Hatakeyama ▶ Tamegoro Sudo Daita Ooiwa ▶ Daigoro Kumano Kirenger Lisa Komaki Peggy Matsuyama Momorenger Yukio Ito Kenji Asuka Midorenger ==Cast== * Tsuyoshi Kaijou / Akarenger: Naoya Makoto * Akira Shinmei / Aorenger: Hiroshi Miyauchi * Daita Ooiwa / Kirenger I: Baku Hatakeyama * Daigoro Kumano / Kirenger II: Tamegoro Sudo * Peggy Matsuyama / Momorenger: Lisa Komaki * Kenji Asuka / Midorenger: Yukio Itō ==Voice actor== * Narration: Nobuo Tanaka (1–14): Tōru Ohira (15–84) ==Songs== ;Opening theme * "Susume! Gorenger" ("Proceed! Gorenger") ** Lyrics: Shotaro Ishinomori ** Composition & arrangement: Michiaki Watanabe ** Artist: Isao Sasaki and Mitsuko Horie with Colombia Yurikago-kai (chorus) ;Ending themes * "Himitsu Sentai Gorenger" (Secret Squad Gorengers) ** Lyrics: Saburo Yatsude ** Composition & Arrangement: Michiaki Watanabe ** Artist: Isao Sasaki with Koorogi '73 ** Episodes: 1―63 * "Mi Yo!! Gorenger" ("Look!! Gorenger") ** Lyrics: Shotaro Ishinomori ** Composition & arrangement: Michiaki Watanabe ** Artist: Isao Sasaki and Koorogi '73 with Wilbees ** Episodes: 64―84 Category:Super Sentai series Category:1975 television series debuts Category:1977 television series endings Category:1970s Japanese television series debuts Category:1970s Japanese television series endings
title: Himitsu Sentai Gorenger
